title: How can we check whether we are mugging things or understanding concepts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A Prakhar. I believe understanding things are as important as memorising them. The best way that's coming to my mind right now is to teach others.That will change your perspective as a learner.But you should chose your disciples wisely!Even they need to have an inquisitive mind to question you back. For example,one of teachers who is also a senior orthopaedic surgeon once told me that when he was a student,there were no easy going you tube videos or even Internet in the first place. So he used to write letters to his father regarding what he learnt in a day.Following which he used to receive letters from his father whose inquisitive mind held questions that helped him understand stuffs better. The same theory I have applied to myself though I send to my father via what's app.  above is an image of what I learnt and send it to my father via what's app! Happy Learning! ~Say.

If you can master the concept you learnt and followed it you mugged and if you find a new concept out of it or you practically applied that concept for a different thing that is not meant for but you have succeded then You have understood the concept
